activities.name: Springfestival Graz
activities.description: Urban indoor festival focused on electronic art and music, featuring international artists across various venues.
activities.price_range: Moderate to Expensive (depends on ticket type)
activities.seasonal_notes: Kicks off the festival season in Graz, usually late May/early June.
activities.booking_tips: Check festival website for specific dates, lineup, and ticket sales.

activities.name: Explore Eggenberg Palace Gardens
activities.description: Witness the blooming flowers and lush greenery in the expansive gardens of Eggenberg Palace.
activities.seasonal_notes: Gardens come alive in spring; peacocks are often seen displaying.
activities.booking_tips: Palace interior tours require separate booking/tickets.

activities.name: Hike the Murradweg (Mur River Bike Path)
activities.description: Enjoy hiking or cycling along sections of the Mur River path as the weather warms up.
activities.seasonal_notes: Pleasant temperatures and budding nature make for scenic walks/rides.
activities.booking_tips: Path is accessible from various points in the city.

activities.name: Styriarte Music Festival
activities.description: Prestigious festival for classical and early music held in various historic venues across Graz.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major classical music event, typically June/July.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets well in advance, especially for popular performances.

activities.name: La Strada Street Theatre Festival
activities.description: International festival of street art, puppet theatre, and nouveau cirque taking over the city's squares and streets.
activities.price_range: Mostly Free (some indoor shows may require tickets)
activities.seasonal_notes: Brings a vibrant, artistic atmosphere to the city, usually late July/early August.
activities.booking_tips: Check the program for locations and times of performances.

activities.name: Swimming at Schwarzlsee
activities.description: Popular recreational lake south of Graz offering swimming, water sports, and leisure facilities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Ideal for cooling off on hot summer days.
activities.booking_tips: Can get busy on weekends; easily reachable by bus.

activities.name: Aufsteirern Festival
activities.description: Largest folk culture festival in Austria celebrating Styrian traditions with food, music, dance, and crafts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Usually held in September, marking the end of summer.
activities.booking_tips: Very popular, expect large crowds. Wear comfortable shoes.

activities.name: Steirischer Herbst Festival
activities.description: Avant-garde festival for contemporary art, theatre, performance, and discourse held across various venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major international arts festival, typically September/October.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets for specific performances and exhibitions in advance.

activities.name: Klanglicht Light Art Festival
activities.description: Impressive festival illuminating the city center with light installations and artistic projections.
activities.seasonal_notes: Transforms the city after dark, usually late October.
activities.booking_tips: Popular event, best explored on foot.

activities.name: Lange Nacht der Museen (Long Night of Museums)
activities.description: One ticket grants access to numerous museums across Graz and Styria, open late into the night.
activities.booking_tips: Plan your route in advance, utilize the shuttle services if available.

activities.name: Wine Tasting along South Styrian Wine Route
activities.description: Take a day trip to the nearby wine region to enjoy scenic vineyards, taste young wine ('Sturm'), and visit traditional 'Buschenschank' taverns.
activities.booking_tips: Requires car or organized tour. Check Buschenschank opening times.

activities.name: Graz Advent Markets (Christmas Markets)
activities.description: Multiple charming Christmas markets spread across the city center, offering crafts, food, Glühwein, and festive atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Runs from late November until Christmas.
activities.booking_tips: Each market has a slightly different theme; visit several. Weekdays are less crowded.

activities.name: Ice Rink in Landhaus Courtyard
activities.description: Skate in the magical setting of the Renaissance Landhaus courtyard, transformed into an ice rink during Advent.
activities.seasonal_notes: Part of the Graz Advent experience.
activities.booking_tips: Check specific opening hours and potential time slots.

activities.name: Skiing/Snowboarding near Graz
activities.description: Access smaller, local ski resorts near Graz (e.g., Präbichl, Salzstiegl) or larger resorts within a couple of hours drive for winter sports.
activities.price_range: Moderate to Expensive (Lift pass, rental, transport)
activities.seasonal_notes: Dependent on snow conditions, typically December-March.
activities.booking_tips: Check snow reports and resort operating status. Consider day trip bus packages.
